attributes.action: Peterborough City Council Proposed Cuts to Children & Adult  Services
attributes.additional_details: Peterborough City Council are proposing cuts of £2.9 Million to Adult Social Care, Childrens Services £1.4 includes closure of Childrens Centres, Complete cut to St Georges Hydrotherapy pool proposed in April. Part of a plan to save £19 Million.  As one of the largest growing Cities in the UK we need to enhance these services for the well being of families, not close them. Please check proposals by visiting@peterborough.gov.uk and sign the petition before the full Council Meeting on the 5th March 14.
